history.proof: qauto depth: 4 l: on use: Nat.mul_0_r, rem_erase, div_rem_spec1, Nat.mul_comm, rem_mult_rem, Nat.mul_1_l, rem_2_is_0_or_1.

exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.
The reference Nat.div_rem_spec1 was not found in the current environment.
[Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros. split. - rewrite rem_prop with (n:=x) (r:=1). + rewrite rem_rem. apply Nat.divide. exists y. symmetry. apply Nat.rem_small. * apply Nat.lt_0_1. + apply Nat.div_rem_spec1. - intros H. apply Nat.divide in H. destruct H as [z H]. apply Nat.eq_mul_1 in H. destruct H as [Hx Hy]. rewrite <- Hx, <- Hy. apply rem_mult_rem.
